import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { addTodo } from '../actions' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {InputGroup} from 'react-bootstrap' import {FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap' const AddTodo = ({ dispatch }) => { let input return (
{ e.preventDefault() if (!input.value.trim()) { return } dispatch(addTodo(input.value)) input.value = '' }}> input = node} />
) } export default connect()(AddTodo)
